rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light and ventilation. Features large windows towards the north to adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering a seamless transition and additional natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with windows ensuring proper ventilation. Positioned away from main entrance as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Separate living and sleeping area for the staff, ensuring privacy and efficiency. Incorporates a small balcony.

rooms.name: Balcony (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: A spacious outdoor area that overlooks the living room and dining area, designed to enhance natural light and ventilation. Features planters.

openings.name: North-facing Entrance
openings.description: Primary entrance opening facing north as per Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance for servant's quarters and utilities, discretely located on the south side.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A serene master bedroom with a spacious north-facing balcony for natural light and ventilation. Includes built-in wardrobes.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with its own balcony, designed for ample daylight and airflow. Includes closet space.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Connected to the master bedroom, featuring essential fixtures and good ventilation.

rooms.name: Balcony (First Floor)
rooms.description: Spacious outdoor area shared between bedrooms. Provides natural lighting and promotes cross-ventilation across the first floor.

openings.name: Balcony Entrance
openings.description: Openings leading to balconies for both bedrooms, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu guidelines.
